attributes.additional_details:
Marcus Rashford has worked tirelessly during the lockdown period to ensure that free school meals are still available to families whom desperately need it. He has also helped to raise over £120 Million in funds to get the project started as well as forcing Government to U-Turn on their previous rejection of the policy.  
If Captain Tom Moore can be knighted for his fundraising efforts then Mr. Rashford deserves the acclaim also.
attributes.background: Government need to nominate Marcus Rashford of Manchester United for a knighthood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: https://www.gov.uk/honours.
